document_data.name: Cirian
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cirian''' was a murderer who resided in the ruined [[Temple of Bhaal (Undercity)|Temple of Bhaal]] in the [[Undercity]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''The Dread Lord calls!''|Cirian}}
document_data.Description: Cirian was a [[human]] woman with light skin and brown eyes. Her head showed a half-shaven scalp and, on the opposite side, a mop of long blonde hair. When out of her civilian disguise, she wielded a common tool of her [[Bhaalist]] sect â€“ an [[enchanted]] [[dagger]] called ''[[Murderous Cut]].''
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Cirian led a band of murderers on a mission of venerating their evil [[deity]] through the slaughtering of innocents in the [[Bloomridge Park]] of the [[Lower City]]. It was unknown if the slaughter was commenced or if the Bhaalists were stopped and slain by the [[Absolute Adversaries]].
